robot.mapping

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.mapping.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains information about obstacles on the observed playing field. Contains static getters and setters as only one instance of this class will exist.
    Since:
    2013-11-09
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Michael, Andreas

      • getWaypoint

        public static void getWaypoint(double[] wp)
        Updates the waypoint array with the coordinates of the current waypoint to be traveled to. If the waypoint are new, set newWaypoints to false.
        Parameters:
        wp - - size 2 array for the x and y values of the waypoint
